page.title: 06TRANSPORT CONTINUED
page.content: (2)Police The post has jurisdiction over 84 miles of motorway in Lancashire;theM.6, M.58, M.55 and M.61, and is in radio contact with its mobile units. The post is staffed by 1 Chief Inspector,5 sergeants and 42 Constables.Duties include: (a) Escort (b)Criminal Investigation (c)Traffic (d) Monitoring Commercial Traffic. (3)Maintenance Compound A base from which regular maintenance on the motorway is carried out.(Major roadworks excluded).The compound maintains supplies of motorway 'furniture',specialist vehicles(snow ploughs,etc.) and salt and grit for surface treatment.
